EmailTemplate.name: 18-Bus @ Cloud Spd-Peering Engineering-Email-EmailSeriesPeerng-T003Q5.Email 3.3
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Hello}}, there's more to learn about automated peering
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Hi {{lead.First Name}}, I hope you enjoyed reading our peering white paper. You might also be interested in our automated peering solution. Did you know that it covers EPE, end-to-end application latency engineering, as well as the industry’s most scalable and economical solution for DDoS protection? If you’re interested in more information, check out this link <[[https://pf.content.nokia.com/webscale-peering-hub/automated-peering-engineering?lb_email=%7b%7blead.Email%20Address%7d%7d&did=d000000001et&utm_campaign=peering_engineering&utm_source=email-list-email-list-marketo-webscale&utm_medium=email&utm_content=automated-peering-engineering-sp&utm_term=peering-personal-follow-up]]>, or we can have an expert follow up with you. Best, Jeff Sugimoto Global Technical Sales Leader, Nokia Enterprise and Webscale © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
